patthana2.4:9.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:9.2: kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ paṭicca sīlabbataparāmāsasaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ paṭicca mānasaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ paṭicca issāsaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ paṭicca macchariyasaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaññojanaṃ, mānasaññojanaṃ paṭicca bhavarāgasaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, bhavarāgasaññojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaññojanaṃ, vicikicchāsaññojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaññojanaṃ. #1
patthana2.4:10.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:10.2: saññojane paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.4:11.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:11.2: kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana2.4:12.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:12.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.4:12.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.4:12.10: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.4:13.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:14.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:14.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā saññojanā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.4:15.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:15.2: kāmarāgasaññojanañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ.
patthana2.4:16.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:16.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca saññojane ca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #2
patthana2.4:17.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:17.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca kāmarāgasaññojanañca paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.4:18.1: (Ārammaṇapaccaye rūpaṃ natthi. Adhipatipaccayo hetusadiso, vicikicchāsaññojanaṃ natthi.)
patthana2.4:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.4:26.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:27.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:27.2: ahetukaṃ nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.4:28.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:29.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:29.2: vicikicchāsaññojanañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca avijjāsaññojanaṃ. #3
patthana2.4:33.1: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.4:40.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri (sabbattha cattāri) vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri … pe … magge tīṇi, sampayutte cattāri … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana2.4:43.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.4:47.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.4:48.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:48.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.4:48.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.4:48.10: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā nosaññojanā khandhā. #1
patthana2.4:49.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:49.2: nosaññojane khandhe paccayā saññojanā, vatthuṃ paccayā saññojanā. #2
patthana2.4:50.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:50.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā saññojanañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.4:50.6: vatthuṃ paccayā saññojanā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā saññojanā sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.4:51.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:51.2: kāmarāgasaññojanañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ, kāmarāgasaññojanañca vatthuñca paccayā diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ (cakkaṃ) #1
patthana2.4:52.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paccayā nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:52.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca saññojane ca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.4:52.7: Saññojane ca vatthuñca paccayā nosaññojanā khandhā. #2
patthana2.4:53.1: Saññojanañca nosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:53.2: nosaññojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca kāmarāgasaññojanañca paccayā tayo khandhā diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.4:53.5: Kāmarāgasaññojanañca vatthuñca paccayā diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ avijjāsaññojanaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.4:54.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.4:55.1: Nahetuyā cattāri (yattha yattha vatthu labbhati, tattha tattha ninnetabbaṃ), naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.4:57.1: Evaṃ itarepi dve gaṇanā ca nissayavāro ca kātabbo.
patthana2.4:61.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.4:68.1: Saññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:68.2: saññojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ saññojanānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.4:69.1: Saññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:69.2: saññojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.4:70.1: Saññojano dhammo saññojanassa ca nosaññojanassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:70.2: saññojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ saññojanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.4:71.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:71.2: nosaññojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.4:73.1: Saññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:73.6: Saññojane ārabbha saññojanā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.4:74.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:74.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.4:74.8: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.4:74.10: nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.4:74.19: vatthuṃ nosaññojane khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.4:74.22: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nosaññojanacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.4:74.30: nosaññojanā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.4:75.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:75.14: vatthuṃ nosaññojane khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana2.4:76.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa ca nosaññojanassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:76.12: vatthuṃ nosaññojane khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha saññojanā ca saññojanasampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.4:77.1: Saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā saññojanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.4:79.1: Saññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.4:80.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:80.6: tīṇi (tiṇṇampi ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipatipi kātabbā, vibhajitabbā tīṇipi).
patthana2.4:81.1: Saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā saññojanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.4:81.3: saññojane ca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā … pe … tīṇi.

patthana2.4:84.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:84.2: purimā purimā nosaññojanā khandhā pacchimānaṃ … pe …

patthana2.4:86.1: Saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā saññojanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.4:91.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:91.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.4:92.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.4:93.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa ca nosaññojanassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:93.5: saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.4:93.13: senāsanaṃ saññojanānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.4:94.1: Saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā saññojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.4:96.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.4:97.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:97.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.4:98.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa ca nosaññojanassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:98.6: vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha saññojanā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.4:98.8: vatthu saññojanānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.4:100.1: Saññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.4:101.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … pe …. #1

patthana2.4:110.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.4:111.1: Nosaññojano dhammo saññojanassa ca nosaññojanassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.4:112.1: Saññojano ca nosaññojano ca dhammā nosaññojanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.4:114.1: Saññojano dhammo saññojanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.4:115.1: Saññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.4:117.1: Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.4:125.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
